meanings.sent1: The rock was vuggier than the one we found yesterday.
meanings.sent2: The cave became vuggier as we ventured deeper inside.
meanings.sent3: The vuggier stone seemed to have more holes than a sponge!
meanings.sent4: Her smile was as vuggier as a piece of Swiss cheese.
meanings.sent5: The vuggier texture of the wall made it look like a honeycomb.

meanings.sent1: Today's discovery was vuggier than any we've made before.
meanings.sent2: The soil in this area is vuggier than in the neighboring fields.
meanings.sent3: The vuggier pattern on the fabric made it look like a piece of lace.
meanings.sent4: The vuggier appearance of the landscape reminded me of a lunar surface.
meanings.sent5: The vuggier texture of the fruit made it seem like it was filled with tiny caves.

meanings.sent1: The vuggier terrain made it challenging to walk without stumbling.
meanings.sent2: The vuggier formations in the rocks indicated a history of volcanic activity.
meanings.sent3: The vuggier surface of the moon made it look like a giant piece of Swiss cheese.
meanings.sent4: Her dress was as vuggier as a patch of mushrooms in the forest.
meanings.sent5: The vuggier texture of the carpet felt like walking on a field of tiny bubbles.
